In this [93mwork[0m, a [93mlattice[0m-[93mdistortion[0m [93mstrategy[0m is [93mproposed[0m, by [93musing[0m a [93mseries[0m of [93mlanthanides[0m (from [93mGd[0m to [93mLu[0m) as the [93mdominant[0m A [93msites[0m and a [93mseries[0m of [93malkalines[0m (from [93mMg[0m to [93mBa[0m) as the A-[93msite[0m [93msubstitutions[0m, to [95minvestigate[0m the [93mgeometric[0m [93meffect[0m on the [93mpyrochlores[0m for [93mOER[0m. It is [93mfound[0m that the [93mlarger[0m [93mradii[0m [93mdifference[0m between the A [93msites[0m and the A-[93msite[0m [93msubstitutions[0m, the [93mlarger[0m [93mlattice[0m [93mexpansion[0m of these [93malloyed[0m [93mpyrochlore[0m [93mruthenates[0m, [93maccompanied[0m by the [93mshortened[0m [93mRu[0m─[93mO[0m [93mbonding[0m, the [93menlarged[0m [93mRu[0m─[93mO[0m─[93mRu[0m [93mbond[0m [93mangle[0m, and the [93menhanced[0m [93mcovalency[0m of [[93mRuO[0m [93m6[0m ] [93moctahedra[0m. The [93mlarge[0m [93mlattice[0m [93mexpansion[0m [93malso[0m [33mleads[0m a [93mrapid[0m A-[93msite[0m [93mleaching[0m and the [93mformation[0m of [93mprotective[0m [93mRuO[0m [93mx[0m [93mreconstruction[0m [93mlayers[0m, which [93msuppress[0m the [93mprogressive[0m [93mmetal[0m [93mdissolution[0m, the [93mlattice[0m [93mcontraction[0m, and the [93mresulting[0m [93minsulated[0m [93mOER[0m [93mdeactivation[0m. On [93maccount[0m of the [93msynergistic[0m [93meffect[0m from the [93mlattice[0m [93mdistortion[0m, the [93mmost[0m [93mdistorted[0m [93mLuBa[0m [93mpyrochlores[0m [93mexhibit[0m the [93mhighest[0m [93mOER[0m [93mperformance[0m and the [93mgreatest[0m [93menhancement[0m in [93meither[0m [93melectrochemical[0m [93mtesting[0m or [93mPEMWE[0m [93moperation[0m, [93mdemonstrating[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mconsiderable[0m [93mpotential[0m for [93mpractical[0m [93mapplications[0m.

In this [93mstudy[0m, [93mwe[0m [95mexplore[0m the [93meffect[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m on the [93mbonding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of the [93munsymmetric[0m [93mphenanthroline[0m [93mextractant[0m ([93mEt[0m-[93mTol[0m-[93mCyMe4[0m-[93mATPhen[0m, [93mL[0m ) in its [93mcomplexes[0m with [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ and [93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ [93musing[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m ([93mDFT[0m) and [93mvarious[0m [93mbonding[0m [93manalyses[0m. [93mPressures[0m [93mranging[0m from [93m0[0m to [93m10[0m [93mGPa[0m are [93mapplied[0m to [95minvestigate[0m [91mchanges[0m in the [93mgeometry[0m, [93melectronic[0m [93mstructure[0m, and [93mbond[0m [93mcovalency[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mshow[0m that [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m [93msignificantly[0m [93menhances[0m the [93mcovalent[0m [93mcharacter[0m of the [93mbonds[0m between [93mL[0m and [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ /[93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ , [93mevidenced[0m by [93mincreased[0m [93melectron[0m [93mdensity[0m [93mρ[0m([93mr[0m), [93mdelocalization[0m [93mindices[0m ([93mDI[0m), [93mstronger[0m [93mcovalent[0m [93morbital[0m [93minteractions[0m ([93mΔ[0m [93mE[0m [93morb[0m ), and [93minteratomic[0m [93mexchange[0m [93minteractions[0m ( [93mV[0m [93mxc[0m ). [93mNotably[0m, while the [93mEu[0m- [93mL[0m [93mbond[0m [93mlengths[0m [93mcontract[0m [93mmore[0m than the [93mAm[0m- [93mL[0m [93mbonds[0m, the [93m5f[0m [93morbitals[0m of [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ are [93mmore[0m [93msensitive[0m to [93mpressure[0m than the [93mrelatively[0m [93mcontracted[0m [93m4f[0m [93morbitals[0m of [93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ , [93mresulting[0m in an [93menhanced[0m [93mcovalency[0m [93mdifference[0m [93mconfirmed[0m by [93mnatural[0m [93mlocalized[0m [93mmolecular[0m [93morbital[0m ([93mNLMO[0m) [93manalysis[0m. These [93mfindings[0m [93mhighlight[0m the [93msignificant[0m [93mrole[0m of [93mhigh[0m [93mpressure[0m in [93maltering[0m the [93mbonding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m of [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mcompounds[0m, [93mopening[0m [93mnew[0m [93mavenues[0m for [93mfurther[0m [93mstudies[0m of [93mhighly[0m [93mefficient[0m [93mAm[0m [93m3[0m+ /[93mEu[0m [93m3[0m+ [93mseparation[0m.
